short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Entrepreneur.com experience with additional features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience on Entrepreneur.com with the Entrepreneur.com Enhancer. This handy Chrome extension adds intuitive features and seamless enhancements to elevate your interaction with the site.

* Adds a comments section so you can interact with other entrepreneurs
* Emoji reactions right inside your articles allows you to see how other entrepreneurs are reacting to news and articles
* RSS reader to take a quick glance at the latest articles
* Social share buttons

With more features to come

* This is extension is still under active development *
